FAQ.question: Who can enroll?
FAQ.answer: Due to the fact that the academy is not stigmatized, plus size models, LGBTQI community are free to enroll.

Fitness.paragraph: Taahirah Modeling Academy believes in keeping our models in shape. Their health and fitness is very important to us. As a result we offer:

Workshops.paragraph: TMA hosted its first workshop on the 29th of May 2021 at Mafikeng Innovation Hub. The purpose of the workshop was to officially welcome the models to the academy by educating them about the purpose of the academy. 2 guest speakers  were invited to have a talk with the models about being a leader, the importance of time management and the world of runway.

FoNMM.about1: THE AIM OF OUR PAGEANT IS TO EMPOWER AND GROW THE YOUTH TO BECOME BETTER FUTURE LEADERS THROUGH THE SKILLS OFFERED DURING THEIR ‘FACE OF NGAKA MODIRI MOLEMA’ JOURNEY.
FoNMM.about2: FACE OF NGAKA MODIRI MOLEMA IS A PAGEANT COMETITION FOUNDED IN THE CAPITAL CITY, MAFIKENG, AND SHALL BE HOSTED ANNUALLY AT DIFFERENT SUB DISTRICTS.
FoNMM.about3: IT IS A PLATFORM FOR BOTH MALES AND FEMALES AGED 8-29 YEARS RESIDING IN THE NGAKA MODIRI MOLEMA DISTRICT.
requirements: - All applicants must be South African citizens.
- Must be between 8-29 years of age.
- All applicants should not be married
- ALL APPLICANTS QUALIFY WITH OR WITHOUT A CHILD
- Applicants should have no criminal record.
- Applicants should have Instagram and/or Facebook.
- Application fee (R250) to be paid to the banking details sent by the pageant director only.
- For safety and security purposes, banking details will be sent to applicants via E-mail and WhatsApp after application form is submitted.

Contact.address: 2696 James Watt Cres, Mafikeng Industrial, Mahikeng, 2745
Contact.paragraph: TAAHIRAH MODELING ACADEMY established in 2019, with the aim to illuminate models with the modeling industry by pinning its focus firstly on modeling fundamental features such as cultivating one’s self esteem, confidence, and personality. Secondly, we will educate models with aspects such as runway and pageant walks; public speaking and fashion sense. Thirdly, the academy will outline how modeling and fitness intertwine. Furthermore, the academy will partake in encountering communal activities as part of the TMA charity foundation, like the community outreach. TAAHIRAH MODELING ACADEMY is a licensed agency located in North West, Mahikeng In addition to being a start-up academy in Mahikeng, we offer modeling development, photoshoot skills, public speaking skills, pageant and runway skills and life skills. Our mission is to provide them with training and once they are well trained, we take them to various competitions locally and nationally. TAAHIRAH MODELING ACADEMY represents both males and females between 5-35 years of age, including Plus Size and LGBTQ models.

Furthermore, the academy will partake in encountering communal activities as part of the TMA charity foundation, like the community outreach. Our mission is to provide them with training and once they are well trained, we take them to various competitions locally and nationally.
